title: Dallas Cassandra
author: VD
content_html:
Rod Dreher doesn’t like what he sees coming down the road:

In my experience, this is where most (but not all) business people are politically. To the extent they back Republicans, it’s out of hoping that GOP pols will say what the religious and social conservatives want to hear, but not deliver on it…. If I were betting on it, I’d say that every traditional religious organization in this country is on track to lose its tax-exempt status in the next 10 to 20 years.

12-15 years sounds about right to me. Two terms of Hillary Clinton will other have the country ready for the second coming of Ronald Reagan or else so demoralized and decivilized that her successor will have carte blanche to really twist the knife on the remnants of the Christian Nation.
